Message.Title: Powell! Never Anything But a PC Democrat RINO!
Message.Msg: Colin Powell's "You break it you own it" drivel was a stupid little catch-phase that only Ivy League losers, PC sluts and gullible fools would love... as if our defending the world from the most insane violent radical Regime on the planet, with oil money to back it up, meant we had to take ownership of the beast after cutting off its head! Crazy! Screw the Iraqis and Afghans... let them put their own humpty-dumpty back together again!! As for us, we should have ki.ll.ed the threat and left! We owed and owe them NOTHING!... and should have departed both rat-holes within SIX months! And btw, it was PC P.ig Democrats who spent EIGHT years (2001-08) calling our troops every name in the book, from 'murderers', to 'torturers', to 'butchers', until the day a clueless majority of Americans put a radical PC P.ig in the White House! Then, they suddenly became P.ig heroes! P.igs could care less about our troops... nothing has changed in 40 years! As for Colon, he's done jackshyt since leaving the military... a pure loser!

Message.Title: Obama still refuses to cut spending in any way
Message.Msg: He said he wanted a "balanced" approach during the election. Now we have the tax hikes and STILL he won't agree to spending cuts as part of the debt ceiling negotiations. He threw away the recommendations of HIS OWN deficit commission, Simpson-Bowles. It's like he doesn't even CARE about these huge deficits and this massive money-printing by the federal reserve. We have to fight this man, people. Obama has no concern that he is bankrupting America. We have to assume, given what is happening, that he is the enemy of our future in America. Call your congressman/woman and tell them... this has to STOP!

Topic.Title: Obama still refuses to cut spending in any way

Message.Msg: You a. and others do not understand how money and credit is put into the system through debt. The nice shysters at the "Fed" create it from thin air and charge usury on it. However, they DO NOT create the money to pay that usury. This leads to an ever increasing debt load. Few will speak out against this racket which is as old as ancient Babylon where it originated. The only other source of money at this time is coinage. The government pays this directly into circulation with no usury and makes a small profit called seignorage. If they can create coins they can print paper too as Lincoln did during the Civil War. They were called "U, S, Notes" and 4.5 billion dollars was created at NO interest. They are supposed to circulate by law but the banksters took them from open circulation and put them in their vaults as "reserves". Do some reading on the subject and see how you are being had.
